name: CyberSpace (LGgameLAB)
description:
2D Action Point and Click Shooter Flying Platformer! Free

Blast away bit stealing enemies in this small action game made with python/pygame! Challenge your friends to achieve the highest score and survive to the end. 

DEVELOPMENT IS ONGOING. This game is incomplete and is my first ongoing videogame project

For more eventual info check Our site

Instructions:
Fire at enemies to score points and try to bring the decryptor to the Cyber Door to proceed to the next level. Collecting coin bits will give you points but will also go to the meter on the left which will restore your health. Watch out because you have limited amount of health shown by the green bar at the top. Your maximum health will increase as your coin meter fills up each time so make sure to get those coins!
